name: 林信標
objective:
This course is to introduction the evolution of wireless communication technologies and system. The following topics are included:
1. Evolutions of Wireless Systems
2. Overview on Wireless Technologies 
3. Wireless Propagation Channel Properties and Modeling
4. TDMA Technologies and Systems
5. CDMA Technologies and Systems
6. OFDM Technologies and Systems
schedule:
1 week Evolutions of Wireless Systems
2 weeks Overview on Wireless Technologies 
1 week TDMA Technologies and Systems
1 week CDMA Technologies and Systems
2 weeks Wireless Propagation Channel Properties and Modeling
2 weeks　　OFDM overview
2 week　　OFDM transmission scheme
2 weeks　　Synchronization and channel estimation of OFDM system
2 weeks  OFDM Systems
3 weeks Final Project Presentation
materials:
1.　　A. F. Molisch, “Wireless Communication”, 2011, John Wiley & Sons, Ltd
2.     T.S. Rappaport, “Wireless Communications”, 1996, Prentice Hall.
3.　　S.R. Saunders, “Antennas and Propagation for Wireless Communication Systems”, 1999, John Willey & Sons, LTD.
4.　　D.P. Agrawal, “Introduction to Wireless and Mobile Systems”, 2003, Thomson Learning, Inc.
